name: Computer Science Engineering
description: The CSE department focuses on software development, algorithms, and modern computing technologies.
fullDescription: Our Computer Science Engineering department is at the forefront of technological innovation. We provide comprehensive education in software development, data structures, algorithms, artificial intelligence, and emerging technologies.

name: Information Technology
description: IT department specializes in information systems, network administration, and cybersecurity.
fullDescription: The Information Technology department focuses on the practical application of computing technologies in business environments. Students learn about system administration, network security, and enterprise software solutions.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: ECE department covers electronics, communication systems, and embedded technologies.
fullDescription: Electronics & Communication Engineering department provides comprehensive education in electronic circuits, communication systems, signal processing, and embedded systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Mechanical department focuses on design, manufacturing, and thermal systems engineering.
fullDescription: The Mechanical Engineering department offers a comprehensive program covering design, manufacturing, thermodynamics, and materials science.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Civil department specializes in infrastructure development, construction, and environmental engineering.
fullDescription: Civil Engineering department focuses on the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure projects.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: MBA program develops leadership skills and business acumen for management roles.
fullDescription: Our MBA program is designed to develop future business leaders with strong analytical, strategic, and leadership skills.
